item.label: bees-in-3d
item.title: Bumblebees in the UK
item.body: View stunning images of bumblebees online and read about the decline of these important insects in the UK.

item.label: bumblebee-identification
item.title: Bumblebee identification
item.body: Which species visit your garden? Use our ID guide or post a question on our bug forum to find out.

item.label: how-science-works-animal-societies
item.title: How Science Works: Bee colonies
item.body: Bees are very sociable, how do their societies work? Learn how they communicate and about their life cycle.
